post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Title:         Junior Web Developer
Company:         Elemental Inc.
Position Type:         Contract
Pay Rate:         TBD
Date Posted:         Mar-11-10
Browse Similar Postings

ShareThis

Elemental (http://elementalinc.com) is a Toronto based marketing agency. We are seeking a web developer that has facility with hand-coding html and CSS, knows asp/vbscript and ASP.NET. Skill with Flash is a bonus.

This position is for a six month contract, 5 days per week, 7.5 hours per day, to start.

Please provide an online portfolio, with examples of html-based design that permits code examination.


We thank all applicants who respond, but only those selected for an interview will be contacted.
Location:         Canada-ON-Toronto
Telecommute:         No (Onsite Position)
Contact Name:        Mark Reilly
Contact Phone:        
Contact Email:        mark.reilly@elementalinc.com
URL:        http://www.elementalinc.com
Contact Comments:

Please apply by email - no phone calls
Please mention Dev Bistro when contacting us.
post.title: Junior Web Developer-Elemental Inc.
